name: Seize Fate
effect: Jin Bonus This card costs 2 less to activate. For the rest of the game, if your champion would take damage, remove that many damage counters from them instead and then if there are zero damage counters on your champion, banish your champion.
effect_raw:
[Jin Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate.

For the rest of the game, if your champion would take damage, remove that many damage counters from them instead and then if there are zero damage counters on your champion, banish your champion.

rule.description: Seize Fate does not prevent your champion from dying due to having damage counters equal to or above its life stat.
Removing the damage counters with Seize Fate's replacement effect does not count as an instance of recover.
The replacement effect does not count as damage prevention.

State-based checks that occur to check whether the champion is banished is part of the replacement effect. E.g. If Seize Fate resolves while a champion has no damage counters on it, the champion will not get banished until the next time damage counters are removed if that champion would be dealt damage.
